articles.title: Kyle Abbott returns South Africa white-ball contract Titans Kolpak deal | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The fast bowler had quit South Africa cricket to sign a four-year Kolpak deal with Hampshire in 2017
articles.content:
Abbott left South Africa in 2017 to sign a kolpak deal. © Getty
Fast bowler Kyle Abbott, who'd left South Africa to sign a Kolpak deal with Hampshire in 2017, has returned home to sign a white-ball … [+1994 chars]
